name: tiny.js
description: A JavaScript utility library oriented to real world tasks.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && babel ./modules --out-dir ./lib && node tools/fix-ie8.js ./lib && bannerize lib/*.js --banner=tools/banner.ejs
scripts.dist-core: browserify tiny-core.js --outfile dist/tiny-core.js && node tools/fix-ie8.js ./dist && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --keep-fnames -o dist/tiny-core.min.js -- dist/tiny-core.js
scripts.dist-addons: browserify tiny-addons.js --outfile dist/tiny-addons.js && node tools/fix-ie8.js ./dist && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --keep-fnames -o dist/tiny-addons.min.js -- dist/tiny-addons.js
scripts.dist: browserify tiny.js --outfile dist/tiny.js && node tools/fix-ie8.js ./dist && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --keep-fnames -o dist/tiny.min.js -- dist/tiny.js && bannerize dist/*.js --banner=tools/banner.ejs

author: Mercadolibre Team <chico@mercadolibre.com>
